std::vector< std::string > SampleInfoTableModel::getSampleInfo ( const std::string &  experimentId  ) 

SampleInfoTableModel::getSampleInfo Synopsis:

Given the the experiment id (name) for geno data (CHP or Genotype Short Report), returns the corresponding sample row.

Parameters:
experimentId - experiment name, CHP file name or as report in the Genotype Short Report.
Returns:
- a std::vector< std::string > with the experiment's sample info
